TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that the query builder functionality is working as expected
TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify that the generated report contains only the details relating to applied query.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify generated report contains only the details relating to applied query.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify generated report contains only the details relating to applied query
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: The generated report contains details of crash other than the applied query
